name: 陳昶瑞
objective: 目前建築工程營建產業多賴以圖文資料溝通，文件易有失誤，會提高成本、工期延長、甚至於爭議之狀況。BIM 工具之運用，可有效提升營建產業生產力。各國政府已紛紛推出 BIM 的審照制度，我國(臺灣)近年來於公共工程招標已要求BIM技術之整合運用。本課程針對BIM運用於建築生命週期中各產業間的介紹及效益、實例分享，並於課程中指導同學針對BIM軟體基礎工具使用，並教授未來實務上操作機制。
schedule:
Week 01: The Basics of BIM
Week 02: Applying the Principles of the User Interface and Project
Week 03: The Basics of the Toolbox, Configuring Templates, and Standards
Week 04: Working in a Team
Work 05: Working with Consultants
Week 06: Interoperability: Working Multiplatform
Week 07: Advanced Modeling and Massing
Week 06: Conceptual Design and Design Analysis
Week 07: Working with Phasing, Groups, and Design
Week 08: Visualization
Week 09: Extended Modeling Techniques I
Week 10: Extended Modeling Techniques II
Week 11: Detailing the Design
Week 12: Documenting the Design
Week 13: Annotating the Design
Week 14: Working in the Construction Phase
Week 15: Presenting the Design
Week 16: Working with Point Clouds
Week 17: No Class 
Week 18: Project Presentation
materials: Krrygiel, E. and Vandezande, J. Mastering Autodesk Revit Architecture 2015, Autodesk Official Press, Sybex.
